remarks: An element covered by an atom must be zero.  ( ~ atcveq0 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2011.)
statement:
atcvreq0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atcvreq0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atcvreq0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atcvreq0.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvreq0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvreq0 $p |- ( ( K e. AtLat /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( X C P <-> X = .0. ) ) $.
